Shop from a wide collection of official Superhero t-shirts and other merchandise only at The Souled Store.

products.user_description:
Buy Marvel Merchandise Online

You’d be lying if you say you’ve never come across the phenomenon called Marvel Entertainment. Maybe you’ve read the comics, enjoyed their animated series, binge-watched their shows or attended the first-day first show of their movies - but you’ve definitely been a part of and grown to love this universe. With our collection of official Marvel merchandise, your favourite superhero universe will never be far away from you.

 

The Legacy of Marvel Universe

In 1939, Marvel Comics’ precursor ‘Timely Comics’ was founded by Martin Goodman. Timely’s first comic book was ‘Marvel Comics no. 1’ and featured the Human Torch and the Sub-Mariner. During the ‘Golden Age of Comics’ in the 1940s, Timely Comics introduced many notable characters like Captain America.  As the 1940s came to close, superhero comics fell out of fashion. In 1951, Timely Comics became Atlas Magazines and its output was in genres like humour, horror and science fiction.

During the late 1950s, the ‘Silver Age of Comics’ was ushered by Marvel’s rival, DC Comics. In the 1960s, Atlas renamed itself as Marvel and revolutionised superhero comics. Stan Lee and Jack Kirby are often credited for introducing superheroes that appealed to older readers and heralding the ‘Marvel Age of Comics’.

The strength of Marvel Universe lies in the fact that the characters introduced, though are superheroes, are rooted in real-world and seem relatable. Their superheroes are often flawed, freaks and misfits - a break from the then-prevalent athletic, handsome and perfect superheroes. Spider-Man was a highschool student, Steve Rogers was bullied, Hulk looked like a monster - characteristics like these struck a chord with older readers and soon Marvel Comics found itself a loyal and ever-growing fanbase in not only kids but also young adults and adults.

 

 

The Best Of Marvel Universe Clothing At The Souled Store

If you are a fan of superheroes and are shopping for official Marvel merchandise online in India, you’ve come to the right place. After all, all your superheroes shop from our store as well. Wondering which Marvel-lous heroes will you find in our collection? Keep reading to find out:

 

Iron Man

Tony Stark aka Iron Man was never just a man in a suit - he was our genius, billionaire, playboy, philanthropist. In the Marvel Cinematic Universe’s Infinity Saga, when he sacrificed himself to defeat Thanos and his army, we all mourned for him. After all, We love him 3000, don’t we? And what better way to show it than buy Iron Man products like the Marvel hoodie, t-shirt, mugs, backpacks and other merch online in India at our store.

 

Captain America

The First Avenger, Steve Rogers aka Captain America is brave, dependable, dedicated and a fit leader. When he decided to retire from the superhero life, he requested our help to fill his wardrobe with merch worthy of the Cap and we obliged. With Marvel hoodies, t-shirts, joggers and boxers that one can wear all day, no wonder our Captain America merch is everyone’s favourite.

Thor

Thor Odinson, the God of Thunder needs no introduction. A central figure in the MCU, Thor has had an incredible journey and re-emerged from the ashes, like a phoenix. Being deemed worthy of wielding the Mjolnir and Stormbreaker, he is a force to be reckoned with. If you are looking to buy Marvel t-shirts for men and women with Thor designs, you’ll find them in our collection.

Hulk

A renowned physicist, Dr Bruce Banner transforms into Hulk when he is angry or stressed. His secret? He’s always angry and hell hath no fury like the Hulk angry. So, don’t be a puny human and shop online for Hulk merch like Marvel hoodies, t-shirts and more from our store.

Black Panther

Being crowned the King of Wakanda, T’Challa is no ordinary monarch. Having gained enhanced strength by ingesting a heart-shaped herb, he not only has physical prowess but has also proven to be an expert strategist and leader. Join the Wakandan royalty with official Black Panther merchandise available online only at our store.

 

Spider-Man

Who doesn’t adore the friendly, neighbourhood Spider-Man. When not busy swinging the streets of New York and fighting alongside the Avengers, he can be found attending highschool classes or studying. If you like the webbed superhero, get official Marvel t-shirts for women and men with Spider-Man merchandise like joggers, backpacks, mugs and more online in India only at our store.

 

Deadpool

The Merc with a Mouth needs no introduction. Perhaps the most famous and loved antihero, he has superhuman levels of stamina, strength, agility, reflexes and accelerated healing. Pair it with his talkative nature, you have the perfect recipe for a character who has no ****s to give. And perhaps the only thing he loves more than chimichangas are the Deadpool t-shirts.

 

Punisher

A vigilante with a uniquely brutal brand of justice, Frank Castle aka Punisher has no qualms punishing the guilty. If you wish to join his cause, shop for official Punisher merchandise like Marvel sweatshirts that are available at our store.

 

X-Men

One of the most famous and recognizable franchises of Marvel, X-Men is a faction of mutants who believe in peace and equality between mutants and humans. Opposing them is the Brotherhood of Mutants, who believe in dominance over humans. No matter which side you choose, you’ll find some cool X-Men merch like Marvel hoodies and more on our website and mobile application.

 

Captain Marvel

One of Marvel’s mightiest superhero and protector of the skies, you can hate her or love her, but you can’t ignore her. Carol Danvers is here to kick some ass and inspire you to go higher, further and faster. Get Captain Marvel t-shirts dresses, mobile covers, mugs and more at our store.

And this is just the icing on the cake. Browse through our collection to shop for merchandise of many other characters like Guardians of the Galaxy, Wolverine, Black Widow, Dark Phoenix, Mysterio and Thanos.

 

Check out the following Marvel merchandise

Marvel T-shirts:

These Marvel t-shirts for men and women are the perfect choice when you’re going out with friends or need something casual for office.

Marvel Hoodies:

These hoodies are for those who want to flaunt their madness for everything Marvel. Be it winter or you are freezing in the office AC, Marvel hoodies are always there to rescue you!

Marvel Jacket:

Show off your love for the Marvel Universe with these trendy and offbeat jackets. Wear it when you are out with your friends so they can too ‘Marvel’ at your Marvel Jackets.

Marvel Sweatshirt:

Your perfect companion on a winter day! These Marvel sweatshirts keep you warm and also lets you cosy up in them.

 

Shop for Official Marvel Merchandise Online in India At The Souled Store

The next time you want to shop for Iron Man t-shirts online or want a cool Captain America backpack – our store is where you should come. Our collection of official Marvel merchandise boasts of men’s t-shirts, women’s t-shirts, joggers, boxers, crop tops, drop cut tees, shirts, tank tops, vests, dresses, backpacks, notebooks, coffee mugs and lapel pins. Just visit our website or download our mobile application and get ready to suit up like your favourite superheroes.

 

FAQs

Do you have official merchandise of Marvel?

YES! All our Marvel products are officially licensed merchandise.

 

Do you only have superhero products?

Hell no! As your one-stop-shop for everything pop-culture, we have official Marvel merchandise of not only all your favourite superheroes but also that of your favourite films, television shows, cartoons like tom and Jerry merchandise, F.R.I.E.N.D.S T-Shirts and its merchandise. We also have a range of exclusive original designs called The Souled Store Originals, which you must definitely checkout.

products.artist_details:
Buy Marvel Merchandise Online

You’d be lying if you say you’ve never come across the phenomenon called Marvel Entertainment. Maybe you’ve read the comics, enjoyed their animated series, binge-watched their shows or attended the first-day first show of their movies - but you’ve definitely been a part of and grown to love this universe. With our collection of official Marvel merchandise, your favourite superhero universe will never be far away from you.

 

The Legacy of Marvel Universe

In 1939, Marvel Comics’ precursor ‘Timely Comics’ was founded by Martin Goodman. Timely’s first comic book was ‘Marvel Comics no. 1’ and featured the Human Torch and the Sub-Mariner. During the ‘Golden Age of Comics’ in the 1940s, Timely Comics introduced many notable characters like Captain America.  As the 1940s came to close, superhero comics fell out of fashion. In 1951, Timely Comics became Atlas Magazines and its output was in genres like humour, horror and science fiction.

During the late 1950s, the ‘Silver Age of Comics’ was ushered by Marvel’s rival, DC Comics. In the 1960s, Atlas renamed itself as Marvel and revolutionised superhero comics. Stan Lee and Jack Kirby are often credited for introducing superheroes that appealed to older readers and heralding the ‘Marvel Age of Comics’.

The strength of Marvel Universe lies in the fact that the characters introduced, though are superheroes, are rooted in real-world and seem relatable. Their superheroes are often flawed, freaks and misfits - a break from the then-prevalent athletic, handsome and perfect superheroes. Spider-Man was a highschool student, Steve Rogers was bullied, Hulk looked like a monster - characteristics like these struck a chord with older readers and soon Marvel Comics found itself a loyal and ever-growing fanbase in not only kids but also young adults and adults.

 

 

The Best Of Marvel Universe Clothing At The Souled Store

products.user_description:
Lion King Merchandise For All Fans

Nants Ingonyama Bagithi Baba

That’s got to be the most iconic arrangement of letters ever strung together. And while we don’t quite know what it means, or if we’ve spelled it right, it’s no secret that Lion King is set to be one of the biggest films of 2019. It is one of those timeless movies that appeal to both, children and adults because nobody can get enough of the Savannah, Timon & Pumbaa’s friendship, and Simba’s Pride. 

What’s not to like? The movie has got everything – from friendship and family to murder and treachery, from a discouraged hero to a complex villain, and still has space left for comic relief. Filled to the brim with kooky characters like Zazu and Rafiki, and some of the most epic scenes we’ve had the honour of witnessing, it’s sure to be a treat for ages 6 to 60, alike. 

When Disney announced a remake, the world was sent into pandemonium. With the live-action film hitting the theatres very, VERY soon, we thought we’d give our favourite customers (that’s all of you if that wasn’t clear) a gift that would put Mufasa gifting Simba the pride lands to shame. The Souled Store is incredibly excited to have official licensed Lion king Merchandise! We bet you can feel the love tonight, can’t you? And while it’s going to be extremely tough to watch Mufasa’s death in high definition, we promise our merch will make up for it. Marginally so, but it will. (Psh. No. We’re not taking advantage of your vulnerability. Would we ever do something like that? Not in a million years. Now excuse us, while we just Hakuna Matata out of here.) 

Here is a range of our super cool Lion King Merch: 

Printed T-shirts that you’ll love as much as Simba

The Souled Store brings to you premium super comfy tees for men and women that you can wear to numerous occasions whilst showing your love for Lion King. These tees are trendy and expressive and all on a budget. 

Designer Mobile covers that look as pretty as Nala

If your phone is Timon, then our mobile covers are Pumbaa. They are the best of friends. These phone covers provide you with all the protection and quirk your phone needs. 

Cool Mugs that’ll make Mufasa proud

Mugs that are big enough for all the beverages that you drink while re-watching Lion King in live-action. Alternate use for the mugs is to collect the tears after you watch Mufasa die. They are big enough for that too. 

Cute Sticker and Badges to show your love for Pride Rock

The real reason why Scar took over Pride Rock is that Simba didn’t mark his territory. Don’t make the same mistake. Put badges and stickers over everything you own. Warning: People might think you are obsessed with Lion King (we feel you).

Buy the official Lion King merchandise right now, all available online at The Souled Store and support the game you knew you were born to love. (Also, we looked it up, and “Nants Ingonyama Bagithi Baba” means ‘hear comes a lion, father/oh yes, it’s a lion’. You’re welcome.)
products.short_desc:
Official Licensed Lion King Hakuna Matata Oversized T-Shirts

"It means no worries for the rest of your days." If you live by this philosophy then this Lion King: Hakuna Matata Oversized T-Shirt is for you. The Souled Store brings you the coolest merch for all your favourite movies, shows, and characters.

This t-shirt for men, is a dark green and black, with cool graphics inspired from the movie. Wear it for that streetstyle edge, when you step out for a casual event.

The Souled Store's Lion King: Hakuna Matata Oversized T-Shirt is the perfect choice to show off your love for a legendary piece of cinematic art while still looking stylish as ever.

products.user_description:
Harry Potter and it is magic

More than two decades have passed since the first Harry Potter book was published, and more than a decade has passed since Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows concluded the film series.

We've put together a stunning range of items to commemorate the wonderful universe and bring back memories of your childhood. Ours was the generation that awaited our Hogwarts acceptance letter with bated breath. We grew up with Harry, Ron, and Hermione in the magical Potterverse, and it always felt like we were growing up with them.

We loved their first flying lesson, first charms class, Dumbledore's wisdom, disliked Snape but later fell in love with him, and faced Voldemort in the Hogwarts Battle. If you're as obsessed as we think you are about Harry Potter, you'll want to check out our latest Harry Potter products.

The Souled Store: the quidditch winner

The Souled Store arose from the simple concept of loving what you do and following your heart, as well as our fondness for puns (sold/ souled). The motto is simple: life is short; don't waste it on things you don't enjoy. This idea pervades everything we do, from our products to our website, from our workplace atmosphere to how we connect with our consumers. So, it is the ultimate place to find your favorite Harry Potter merchandise as it is the quidditch winner in the heavily competitive market.

Harry Potter and Collection of Merchandise

The Souled Store ensures that Harry Potter's legacy is not forgotten anytime soon. Fans may always keep the enchantment alive by purchasing the latest Harry Potter products available in our store. We also have pajamas, sweatshirts, boxer pants, polo dresses, and much more. Simply visit the website and allow the enchantment to lead your heart.

T-Shirt: Perfect Chosen One

The boy who vanquished the Dark Lord became known as the "boy who lived" because he was the "chosen one." We may not have the opportunity to dress up as Harry Potter, but we can tell you that we have something that will make you look like the chosen one. T-shirts are frequently composed of an elastic, light, and inexpensive fabric that is also easy to clean. Shop The Souled Store for your Harry Potter tees and show off your house pride. What matters most is what's beneath the surface.

Laptop Bag: Hogwarts Journey Pack

You always have a laptop bag with you, irrespective of how far or where you're traveling. You can put as much stuff in them as you like. If you're starting a new semester at Hogwarts, you'll need a laptop bag that can hold your magic wand, textbooks, and laptop. We have the most recent version of Harry Potter laptop bags, which are very adaptable and ideal for both everyday and travel use.

T-shirt Dresses: Yule Ball Dress

Do you have a Yule Ball at your school and are unsure what to wear? Don't be concerned! We have the perfect selection of t-shirt dresses that are both comfy and fashionable. Prepare to be showered with compliments if you pair your dress with some lovely accessories. Harry Potter merchandise in the form of T-shirt dresses is the best thing one can have in the wardrobe.

Pajamas: Ultimate Comfort

Pajamas are the ultimate comfort and feel free nature when one wears them. Pairing these beautiful harry potter pajamas with extra comfortable t-shirts is the best thing possible. Set yourself free in these with night overalls.

Knitted Sweaters: Muggle your shiver away

When one sees Ron’s mother knitting the sweater for all her sons. The other person even starts craving for a hand-knitted sweater. During the winters and festivities wearing the Knitted Sweater of Harry Potter Theme is simply the best way to showcase your love for it. Muggle your cold away with the perfect sweater.

Joggers: Perfect for your run in Dragon Alley

One of the most popular bottom-wear options on the market is joggers. They're well-known for their practicality and elegance. Joggers are frequently seen as part of a workout outfit. Joggers can be worn for a variety of activities, including sports, exercising, and working out at the gym. The joggers with the popular Harry Potter pattern just seem great and make you want to flaunt them when jogging or running in the park. In today's generation, it helps anyone appear more fun-loving and cooler. Joggers have a slim fit, are comfortable, and give greater movement for all your sportswear demands. Joggers come in a variety of colors, sizes, patterns, and styles. Made entirely of cotton and featuring the most beautiful designs.

FAQs

  1. Are you the official Harry Potter merchandise, and do you also sell other items?

Yes, The Souled Store is one of the authorized retailers of Harry Potter items. They have over 100 partner brands that offer their products through us.

  1. What does "official merchandise" mean exactly?

When you buy licensed merchandise, you're assisting creators and the people they entrust with bringing their thoughts to life. They put a lot of time, effort, and money into creating the products they want you to love, as well as ensuring that they meet their high specifications.

  1. Why should you shop at The Souled Store for Harry Potter merchandise?

You may get your favorite Harry Potter t-shirts, polo dresses, and other Harry Potter goods from this website. The souled store has the appropriate goods to aid you with your nostalgia. The Harry Potter books have captivated a generation and have become an integral part of their lives. With the right Harry Potter Merchandise, every one of us can find our own unique story.

  1. Why can't I find the t-shirt or other product I'm looking for in the style, color, or size I need?

The colors and sizes offered in the online shop, as well as any specific goods, are depending on our current supply. T-shirts, hoodies, vests, and joggers that are in high demand may be refilled soon. If you'd like to learn more about when a specific product will be available online, please contact us.
products.short_desc:
Official Licensed Harry Potter Merchandise.

Because even magical beings need to dress the part while defending the wizarding world!

Picture this: You, casually strolling through Diagon Alley, sporting this enchanting polo. People turn and whisper, ""Is that a member of Dumbledore's Army?"" You just smile mysteriously because, well, you are!

Style Tip: Pair this polo with your trusty wand (or your phone, whatever works) and let loose your wizardry. Who says wizards can't be fashion icons?

products.user_description:
Buy Marvel Merchandise Online

You’d be lying if you say you’ve never come across the phenomenon called Marvel Entertainment. Maybe you’ve read the comics, enjoyed their animated series, binge-watched their shows or attended the first-day first show of their movies - but you’ve definitely been a part of and grown to love this universe. With our collection of official Marvel merchandise, your favourite superhero universe will never be far away from you.

 

The Legacy of Marvel Universe

In 1939, Marvel Comics’ precursor ‘Timely Comics’ was founded by Martin Goodman. Timely’s first comic book was ‘Marvel Comics no. 1’ and featured the Human Torch and the Sub-Mariner. During the ‘Golden Age of Comics’ in the 1940s, Timely Comics introduced many notable characters like Captain America.  As the 1940s came to close, superhero comics fell out of fashion. In 1951, Timely Comics became Atlas Magazines and its output was in genres like humour, horror and science fiction.

During the late 1950s, the ‘Silver Age of Comics’ was ushered by Marvel’s rival, DC Comics. In the 1960s, Atlas renamed itself as Marvel and revolutionised superhero comics. Stan Lee and Jack Kirby are often credited for introducing superheroes that appealed to older readers and heralding the ‘Marvel Age of Comics’.

The strength of Marvel Universe lies in the fact that the characters introduced, though are superheroes, are rooted in real-world and seem relatable. Their superheroes are often flawed, freaks and misfits - a break from the then-prevalent athletic, handsome and perfect superheroes. Spider-Man was a highschool student, Steve Rogers was bullied, Hulk looked like a monster - characteristics like these struck a chord with older readers and soon Marvel Comics found itself a loyal and ever-growing fanbase in not only kids but also young adults and adults.

 

 

The Best Of Marvel Universe Clothing At The Souled Store

If you are a fan of superheroes and are shopping for official Marvel merchandise online in India, you’ve come to the right place. After all, all your superheroes shop from our store as well. Wondering which Marvel-lous heroes will you find in our collection? Keep reading to find out:

 

Iron Man

Tony Stark aka Iron Man was never just a man in a suit - he was our genius, billionaire, playboy, philanthropist. In the Marvel Cinematic Universe’s Infinity Saga, when he sacrificed himself to defeat Thanos and his army, we all mourned for him. After all, We love him 3000, don’t we? And what better way to show it than buy Iron Man products like the Marvel hoodie, t-shirt, mugs, backpacks and other merch online in India at our store.

 

Captain America

The First Avenger, Steve Rogers aka Captain America is brave, dependable, dedicated and a fit leader. When he decided to retire from the superhero life, he requested our help to fill his wardrobe with merch worthy of the Cap and we obliged. With Marvel hoodies, t-shirts, joggers and boxers that one can wear all day, no wonder our Captain America merch is everyone’s favourite.

Thor

Thor Odinson, the God of Thunder needs no introduction. A central figure in the MCU, Thor has had an incredible journey and re-emerged from the ashes, like a phoenix. Being deemed worthy of wielding the Mjolnir and Stormbreaker, he is a force to be reckoned with. If you are looking to buy Marvel t-shirts for men and women with Thor designs, you’ll find them in our collection.

Hulk

A renowned physicist, Dr Bruce Banner transforms into Hulk when he is angry or stressed. His secret? He’s always angry and hell hath no fury like the Hulk angry. So, don’t be a puny human and shop online for Hulk merch like Marvel hoodies, t-shirts and more from our store.

Black Panther

Being crowned the King of Wakanda, T’Challa is no ordinary monarch. Having gained enhanced strength by ingesting a heart-shaped herb, he not only has physical prowess but has also proven to be an expert strategist and leader. Join the Wakandan royalty with official Black Panther merchandise available online only at our store.

 

Spider-Man

Who doesn’t adore the friendly, neighbourhood Spider-Man. When not busy swinging the streets of New York and fighting alongside the Avengers, he can be found attending highschool classes or studying. If you like the webbed superhero, get official Marvel t-shirts for women and men with Spider-Man merchandise like joggers, backpacks, mugs and more online in India only at our store.

 

Deadpool

The Merc with a Mouth needs no introduction. Perhaps the most famous and loved antihero, he has superhuman levels of stamina, strength, agility, reflexes and accelerated healing. Pair it with his talkative nature, you have the perfect recipe for a character who has no ****s to give. And perhaps the only thing he loves more than chimichangas are the Deadpool t-shirts.

 

Punisher

A vigilante with a uniquely brutal brand of justice, Frank Castle aka Punisher has no qualms punishing the guilty. If you wish to join his cause, shop for official Punisher merchandise like Marvel sweatshirts that are available at our store.

 

X-Men

One of the most famous and recognizable franchises of Marvel, X-Men is a faction of mutants who believe in peace and equality between mutants and humans. Opposing them is the Brotherhood of Mutants, who believe in dominance over humans. No matter which side you choose, you’ll find some cool X-Men merch like Marvel hoodies and more on our website and mobile application.

 

Captain Marvel

One of Marvel’s mightiest superhero and protector of the skies, you can hate her or love her, but you can’t ignore her. Carol Danvers is here to kick some ass and inspire you to go higher, further and faster. Get Captain Marvel t-shirts dresses, mobile covers, mugs and more at our store.

And this is just the icing on the cake. Browse through our collection to shop for merchandise of many other characters like Guardians of the Galaxy, Wolverine, Black Widow, Dark Phoenix, Mysterio and Thanos.

 

Check out the following Marvel merchandise

Marvel T-shirts:

These Marvel t-shirts for men and women are the perfect choice when you’re going out with friends or need something casual for office.

Marvel Hoodies:

These hoodies are for those who want to flaunt their madness for everything Marvel. Be it winter or you are freezing in the office AC, Marvel hoodies are always there to rescue you!

Marvel Jacket:

Show off your love for the Marvel Universe with these trendy and offbeat jackets. Wear it when you are out with your friends so they can too ‘Marvel’ at your Marvel Jackets.

Marvel Sweatshirt:

Your perfect companion on a winter day! These Marvel sweatshirts keep you warm and also lets you cosy up in them.

 

Shop for Official Marvel Merchandise Online in India At The Souled Store

The next time you want to shop for Iron Man t-shirts online or want a cool Captain America backpack – our store is where you should come. Our collection of official Marvel merchandise boasts of men’s t-shirts, women’s t-shirts, joggers, boxers, crop tops, drop cut tees, shirts, tank tops, vests, dresses, backpacks, notebooks, coffee mugs and lapel pins. Just visit our website or download our mobile application and get ready to suit up like your favourite superheroes.

 

FAQs

Do you have official merchandise of Marvel?

YES! All our Marvel products are officially licensed merchandise.

 

Do you only have superhero products?

Hell no! As your one-stop-shop for everything pop-culture, we have official Marvel merchandise of not only all your favourite superheroes but also that of your favourite films, television shows, cartoons like tom and Jerry merchandise, F.R.I.E.N.D.S T-Shirts and its merchandise. We also have a range of exclusive original designs called The Souled Store Originals, which you must definitely checkout.

products.artist_details:
Buy Marvel Merchandise Online

You’d be lying if you say you’ve never come across the phenomenon called Marvel Entertainment. Maybe you’ve read the comics, enjoyed their animated series, binge-watched their shows or attended the first-day first show of their movies - but you’ve definitely been a part of and grown to love this universe. With our collection of official Marvel merchandise, your favourite superhero universe will never be far away from you.

 

The Legacy of Marvel Universe

In 1939, Marvel Comics’ precursor ‘Timely Comics’ was founded by Martin Goodman. Timely’s first comic book was ‘Marvel Comics no. 1’ and featured the Human Torch and the Sub-Mariner. During the ‘Golden Age of Comics’ in the 1940s, Timely Comics introduced many notable characters like Captain America.  As the 1940s came to close, superhero comics fell out of fashion. In 1951, Timely Comics became Atlas Magazines and its output was in genres like humour, horror and science fiction.

During the late 1950s, the ‘Silver Age of Comics’ was ushered by Marvel’s rival, DC Comics. In the 1960s, Atlas renamed itself as Marvel and revolutionised superhero comics. Stan Lee and Jack Kirby are often credited for introducing superheroes that appealed to older readers and heralding the ‘Marvel Age of Comics’.

The strength of Marvel Universe lies in the fact that the characters introduced, though are superheroes, are rooted in real-world and seem relatable. Their superheroes are often flawed, freaks and misfits - a break from the then-prevalent athletic, handsome and perfect superheroes. Spider-Man was a highschool student, Steve Rogers was bullied, Hulk looked like a monster - characteristics like these struck a chord with older readers and soon Marvel Comics found itself a loyal and ever-growing fanbase in not only kids but also young adults and adults.

 

 

The Best Of Marvel Universe Clothing At The Souled Store

products.user_description:
Harry Potter and it is magic

More than two decades have passed since the first Harry Potter book was published, and more than a decade has passed since Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows concluded the film series.

We've put together a stunning range of items to commemorate the wonderful universe and bring back memories of your childhood. Ours was the generation that awaited our Hogwarts acceptance letter with bated breath. We grew up with Harry, Ron, and Hermione in the magical Potterverse, and it always felt like we were growing up with them.

We loved their first flying lesson, first charms class, Dumbledore's wisdom, disliked Snape but later fell in love with him, and faced Voldemort in the Hogwarts Battle. If you're as obsessed as we think you are about Harry Potter, you'll want to check out our latest Harry Potter products.

The Souled Store: the quidditch winner

The Souled Store arose from the simple concept of loving what you do and following your heart, as well as our fondness for puns (sold/ souled). The motto is simple: life is short; don't waste it on things you don't enjoy. This idea pervades everything we do, from our products to our website, from our workplace atmosphere to how we connect with our consumers. So, it is the ultimate place to find your favorite Harry Potter merchandise as it is the quidditch winner in the heavily competitive market.

Harry Potter and Collection of Merchandise

The Souled Store ensures that Harry Potter's legacy is not forgotten anytime soon. Fans may always keep the enchantment alive by purchasing the latest Harry Potter products available in our store. We also have pajamas, sweatshirts, boxer pants, polo dresses, and much more. Simply visit the website and allow the enchantment to lead your heart.

T-Shirt: Perfect Chosen One

The boy who vanquished the Dark Lord became known as the "boy who lived" because he was the "chosen one." We may not have the opportunity to dress up as Harry Potter, but we can tell you that we have something that will make you look like the chosen one. T-shirts are frequently composed of an elastic, light, and inexpensive fabric that is also easy to clean. Shop The Souled Store for your Harry Potter tees and show off your house pride. What matters most is what's beneath the surface.

Laptop Bag: Hogwarts Journey Pack

You always have a laptop bag with you, irrespective of how far or where you're traveling. You can put as much stuff in them as you like. If you're starting a new semester at Hogwarts, you'll need a laptop bag that can hold your magic wand, textbooks, and laptop. We have the most recent version of Harry Potter laptop bags, which are very adaptable and ideal for both everyday and travel use.

T-shirt Dresses: Yule Ball Dress

Do you have a Yule Ball at your school and are unsure what to wear? Don't be concerned! We have the perfect selection of t-shirt dresses that are both comfy and fashionable. Prepare to be showered with compliments if you pair your dress with some lovely accessories. Harry Potter merchandise in the form of T-shirt dresses is the best thing one can have in the wardrobe.

Pajamas: Ultimate Comfort

Pajamas are the ultimate comfort and feel free nature when one wears them. Pairing these beautiful harry potter pajamas with extra comfortable t-shirts is the best thing possible. Set yourself free in these with night overalls.

Knitted Sweaters: Muggle your shiver away

When one sees Ron’s mother knitting the sweater for all her sons. The other person even starts craving for a hand-knitted sweater. During the winters and festivities wearing the Knitted Sweater of Harry Potter Theme is simply the best way to showcase your love for it. Muggle your cold away with the perfect sweater.

Joggers: Perfect for your run in Dragon Alley

One of the most popular bottom-wear options on the market is joggers. They're well-known for their practicality and elegance. Joggers are frequently seen as part of a workout outfit. Joggers can be worn for a variety of activities, including sports, exercising, and working out at the gym. The joggers with the popular Harry Potter pattern just seem great and make you want to flaunt them when jogging or running in the park. In today's generation, it helps anyone appear more fun-loving and cooler. Joggers have a slim fit, are comfortable, and give greater movement for all your sportswear demands. Joggers come in a variety of colors, sizes, patterns, and styles. Made entirely of cotton and featuring the most beautiful designs.

FAQs

  1. Are you the official Harry Potter merchandise, and do you also sell other items?

Yes, The Souled Store is one of the authorized retailers of Harry Potter items. They have over 100 partner brands that offer their products through us.

  1. What does "official merchandise" mean exactly?

When you buy licensed merchandise, you're assisting creators and the people they entrust with bringing their thoughts to life. They put a lot of time, effort, and money into creating the products they want you to love, as well as ensuring that they meet their high specifications.

  1. Why should you shop at The Souled Store for Harry Potter merchandise?

You may get your favorite Harry Potter t-shirts, polo dresses, and other Harry Potter goods from this website. The souled store has the appropriate goods to aid you with your nostalgia. The Harry Potter books have captivated a generation and have become an integral part of their lives. With the right Harry Potter Merchandise, every one of us can find our own unique story.

  1. Why can't I find the t-shirt or other product I'm looking for in the style, color, or size I need?

The colors and sizes offered in the online shop, as well as any specific goods, are depending on our current supply. T-shirts, hoodies, vests, and joggers that are in high demand may be refilled soon. If you'd like to learn more about when a specific product will be available online, please contact us.

products.user_description:
Buy Marvel Merchandise Online

You’d be lying if you say you’ve never come across the phenomenon called Marvel Entertainment. Maybe you’ve read the comics, enjoyed their animated series, binge-watched their shows or attended the first-day first show of their movies - but you’ve definitely been a part of and grown to love this universe. With our collection of official Marvel merchandise, your favourite superhero universe will never be far away from you.

 

The Legacy of Marvel Universe

In 1939, Marvel Comics’ precursor ‘Timely Comics’ was founded by Martin Goodman. Timely’s first comic book was ‘Marvel Comics no. 1’ and featured the Human Torch and the Sub-Mariner. During the ‘Golden Age of Comics’ in the 1940s, Timely Comics introduced many notable characters like Captain America.  As the 1940s came to close, superhero comics fell out of fashion. In 1951, Timely Comics became Atlas Magazines and its output was in genres like humour, horror and science fiction.

During the late 1950s, the ‘Silver Age of Comics’ was ushered by Marvel’s rival, DC Comics. In the 1960s, Atlas renamed itself as Marvel and revolutionised superhero comics. Stan Lee and Jack Kirby are often credited for introducing superheroes that appealed to older readers and heralding the ‘Marvel Age of Comics’.

The strength of Marvel Universe lies in the fact that the characters introduced, though are superheroes, are rooted in real-world and seem relatable. Their superheroes are often flawed, freaks and misfits - a break from the then-prevalent athletic, handsome and perfect superheroes. Spider-Man was a highschool student, Steve Rogers was bullied, Hulk looked like a monster - characteristics like these struck a chord with older readers and soon Marvel Comics found itself a loyal and ever-growing fanbase in not only kids but also young adults and adults.

 

 

The Best Of Marvel Universe Clothing At The Souled Store

If you are a fan of superheroes and are shopping for official Marvel merchandise online in India, you’ve come to the right place. After all, all your superheroes shop from our store as well. Wondering which Marvel-lous heroes will you find in our collection? Keep reading to find out:

 

Iron Man

Tony Stark aka Iron Man was never just a man in a suit - he was our genius, billionaire, playboy, philanthropist. In the Marvel Cinematic Universe’s Infinity Saga, when he sacrificed himself to defeat Thanos and his army, we all mourned for him. After all, We love him 3000, don’t we? And what better way to show it than buy Iron Man products like the Marvel hoodie, t-shirt, mugs, backpacks and other merch online in India at our store.

 

Captain America

The First Avenger, Steve Rogers aka Captain America is brave, dependable, dedicated and a fit leader. When he decided to retire from the superhero life, he requested our help to fill his wardrobe with merch worthy of the Cap and we obliged. With Marvel hoodies, t-shirts, joggers and boxers that one can wear all day, no wonder our Captain America merch is everyone’s favourite.

Thor

Thor Odinson, the God of Thunder needs no introduction. A central figure in the MCU, Thor has had an incredible journey and re-emerged from the ashes, like a phoenix. Being deemed worthy of wielding the Mjolnir and Stormbreaker, he is a force to be reckoned with. If you are looking to buy Marvel t-shirts for men and women with Thor designs, you’ll find them in our collection.

Hulk

A renowned physicist, Dr Bruce Banner transforms into Hulk when he is angry or stressed. His secret? He’s always angry and hell hath no fury like the Hulk angry. So, don’t be a puny human and shop online for Hulk merch like Marvel hoodies, t-shirts and more from our store.

Black Panther

Being crowned the King of Wakanda, T’Challa is no ordinary monarch. Having gained enhanced strength by ingesting a heart-shaped herb, he not only has physical prowess but has also proven to be an expert strategist and leader. Join the Wakandan royalty with official Black Panther merchandise available online only at our store.

 

Spider-Man

Who doesn’t adore the friendly, neighbourhood Spider-Man. When not busy swinging the streets of New York and fighting alongside the Avengers, he can be found attending highschool classes or studying. If you like the webbed superhero, get official Marvel t-shirts for women and men with Spider-Man merchandise like joggers, backpacks, mugs and more online in India only at our store.

 

Deadpool

The Merc with a Mouth needs no introduction. Perhaps the most famous and loved antihero, he has superhuman levels of stamina, strength, agility, reflexes and accelerated healing. Pair it with his talkative nature, you have the perfect recipe for a character who has no ****s to give. And perhaps the only thing he loves more than chimichangas are the Deadpool t-shirts.

 

Punisher

A vigilante with a uniquely brutal brand of justice, Frank Castle aka Punisher has no qualms punishing the guilty. If you wish to join his cause, shop for official Punisher merchandise like Marvel sweatshirts that are available at our store.

 

X-Men

One of the most famous and recognizable franchises of Marvel, X-Men is a faction of mutants who believe in peace and equality between mutants and humans. Opposing them is the Brotherhood of Mutants, who believe in dominance over humans. No matter which side you choose, you’ll find some cool X-Men merch like Marvel hoodies and more on our website and mobile application.

 

Captain Marvel

One of Marvel’s mightiest superhero and protector of the skies, you can hate her or love her, but you can’t ignore her. Carol Danvers is here to kick some ass and inspire you to go higher, further and faster. Get Captain Marvel t-shirts dresses, mobile covers, mugs and more at our store.

And this is just the icing on the cake. Browse through our collection to shop for merchandise of many other characters like Guardians of the Galaxy, Wolverine, Black Widow, Dark Phoenix, Mysterio and Thanos.

 

Check out the following Marvel merchandise

Marvel T-shirts:

These Marvel t-shirts for men and women are the perfect choice when you’re going out with friends or need something casual for office.

Marvel Hoodies:

These hoodies are for those who want to flaunt their madness for everything Marvel. Be it winter or you are freezing in the office AC, Marvel hoodies are always there to rescue you!

Marvel Jacket:

Show off your love for the Marvel Universe with these trendy and offbeat jackets. Wear it when you are out with your friends so they can too ‘Marvel’ at your Marvel Jackets.

Marvel Sweatshirt:

Your perfect companion on a winter day! These Marvel sweatshirts keep you warm and also lets you cosy up in them.

 

Shop for Official Marvel Merchandise Online in India At The Souled Store

The next time you want to shop for Iron Man t-shirts online or want a cool Captain America backpack – our store is where you should come. Our collection of official Marvel merchandise boasts of men’s t-shirts, women’s t-shirts, joggers, boxers, crop tops, drop cut tees, shirts, tank tops, vests, dresses, backpacks, notebooks, coffee mugs and lapel pins. Just visit our website or download our mobile application and get ready to suit up like your favourite superheroes.

 

FAQs

Do you have official merchandise of Marvel?

YES! All our Marvel products are officially licensed merchandise.

 

Do you only have superhero products?

Hell no! As your one-stop-shop for everything pop-culture, we have official Marvel merchandise of not only all your favourite superheroes but also that of your favourite films, television shows, cartoons like tom and Jerry merchandise, F.R.I.E.N.D.S T-Shirts and its merchandise. We also have a range of exclusive original designs called The Souled Store Originals, which you must definitely checkout.

The symbol of fury and justice for Wakanda has risen. The Black Panther legacy goes on. Wakanda forever!

Now you can too be as glorious as the Black Panther. Roar with the Wakandan might!

Get the official Black Panther merchandise, available exclusively at The Souled Store.

products.user_description:
Harry Potter and it is magic

More than two decades have passed since the first Harry Potter book was published, and more than a decade has passed since Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows concluded the film series.

We've put together a stunning range of items to commemorate the wonderful universe and bring back memories of your childhood. Ours was the generation that awaited our Hogwarts acceptance letter with bated breath. We grew up with Harry, Ron, and Hermione in the magical Potterverse, and it always felt like we were growing up with them.

We loved their first flying lesson, first charms class, Dumbledore's wisdom, disliked Snape but later fell in love with him, and faced Voldemort in the Hogwarts Battle. If you're as obsessed as we think you are about Harry Potter, you'll want to check out our latest Harry Potter products.

The Souled Store: the quidditch winner

The Souled Store arose from the simple concept of loving what you do and following your heart, as well as our fondness for puns (sold/ souled). The motto is simple: life is short; don't waste it on things you don't enjoy. This idea pervades everything we do, from our products to our website, from our workplace atmosphere to how we connect with our consumers. So, it is the ultimate place to find your favorite Harry Potter merchandise as it is the quidditch winner in the heavily competitive market.

Harry Potter and Collection of Merchandise

The Souled Store ensures that Harry Potter's legacy is not forgotten anytime soon. Fans may always keep the enchantment alive by purchasing the latest Harry Potter products available in our store. We also have pajamas, sweatshirts, boxer pants, polo dresses, and much more. Simply visit the website and allow the enchantment to lead your heart.

T-Shirt: Perfect Chosen One

The boy who vanquished the Dark Lord became known as the "boy who lived" because he was the "chosen one." We may not have the opportunity to dress up as Harry Potter, but we can tell you that we have something that will make you look like the chosen one. T-shirts are frequently composed of an elastic, light, and inexpensive fabric that is also easy to clean. Shop The Souled Store for your Harry Potter tees and show off your house pride. What matters most is what's beneath the surface.

Laptop Bag: Hogwarts Journey Pack

You always have a laptop bag with you, irrespective of how far or where you're traveling. You can put as much stuff in them as you like. If you're starting a new semester at Hogwarts, you'll need a laptop bag that can hold your magic wand, textbooks, and laptop. We have the most recent version of Harry Potter laptop bags, which are very adaptable and ideal for both everyday and travel use.

T-shirt Dresses: Yule Ball Dress

Do you have a Yule Ball at your school and are unsure what to wear? Don't be concerned! We have the perfect selection of t-shirt dresses that are both comfy and fashionable. Prepare to be showered with compliments if you pair your dress with some lovely accessories. Harry Potter merchandise in the form of T-shirt dresses is the best thing one can have in the wardrobe.

Pajamas: Ultimate Comfort

Pajamas are the ultimate comfort and feel free nature when one wears them. Pairing these beautiful harry potter pajamas with extra comfortable t-shirts is the best thing possible. Set yourself free in these with night overalls.

Knitted Sweaters: Muggle your shiver away

When one sees Ron’s mother knitting the sweater for all her sons. The other person even starts craving for a hand-knitted sweater. During the winters and festivities wearing the Knitted Sweater of Harry Potter Theme is simply the best way to showcase your love for it. Muggle your cold away with the perfect sweater.

Joggers: Perfect for your run in Dragon Alley

One of the most popular bottom-wear options on the market is joggers. They're well-known for their practicality and elegance. Joggers are frequently seen as part of a workout outfit. Joggers can be worn for a variety of activities, including sports, exercising, and working out at the gym. The joggers with the popular Harry Potter pattern just seem great and make you want to flaunt them when jogging or running in the park. In today's generation, it helps anyone appear more fun-loving and cooler. Joggers have a slim fit, are comfortable, and give greater movement for all your sportswear demands. Joggers come in a variety of colors, sizes, patterns, and styles. Made entirely of cotton and featuring the most beautiful designs.

FAQs

  1. Are you the official Harry Potter merchandise, and do you also sell other items?

Yes, The Souled Store is one of the authorized retailers of Harry Potter items. They have over 100 partner brands that offer their products through us.

  1. What does "official merchandise" mean exactly?

When you buy licensed merchandise, you're assisting creators and the people they entrust with bringing their thoughts to life. They put a lot of time, effort, and money into creating the products they want you to love, as well as ensuring that they meet their high specifications.

  1. Why should you shop at The Souled Store for Harry Potter merchandise?

You may get your favorite Harry Potter t-shirts, polo dresses, and other Harry Potter goods from this website. The souled store has the appropriate goods to aid you with your nostalgia. The Harry Potter books have captivated a generation and have become an integral part of their lives. With the right Harry Potter Merchandise, every one of us can find our own unique story.

  1. Why can't I find the t-shirt or other product I'm looking for in the style, color, or size I need?

The colors and sizes offered in the online shop, as well as any specific goods, are depending on our current supply. T-shirts, hoodies, vests, and joggers that are in high demand may be refilled soon. If you'd like to learn more about when a specific product will be available online, please contact us.

Peanuts: The Snoopy Head

Charles M. Schulz's Peanuts is a syndicated daily and Sunday American comic strip written and illustrated by him. Adults are present but rarely seen or heard in the strip, which concentrates completely on a social circle of small children. Charlie Brown, the main character, is meek, nervous, and lacking in self-confidence. If you're a fan of Charlie Brown, only the Souled Store has official Peanuts and other cartoon items.

Cartoon Merchandise: Nostalgia

You can add a fun spark to your boring and mundane adult life with our large choice of items. To feel revitalized, drink your morning tea or coffee from one of our cartoon mugs. With some modest inspiration from Dexter's Laboratory, jot down your ideas in the strange notebooks. Wear a couple of cool t-shirts and channel Johhny Bravo's charm and the PowerPuff Girls' brilliance. Like The Flinstones, yabadabooo your way through traffic in flip flops. You'll never be lonely if you bring the Looney Tunes family along. With Disney characters like Mickey Mouse, Goofy, Minnie Mouse, and Donald Duck on your phone cover, it will look fantastic. By pinning up a few badges, you may show your support for Krabby Patties among the residents of Bikini Bottom. With Rick Sanchez's approval, you can effortlessly slip into new dimensions. Tom and Jerry Merchandise

Who hasn't seen or enjoyed the rivalry between Tom and Jerry? It's happened to everyone. Order your favorite Tom and Jerry items only from your trusted partner The Souled Store to relive your pleasant childhood memories of watching it.

The Powerpuff Girls Merchandise

If you miss Cartoon Network as much as we do, here's your chance to relive the 90s with official Powerpuff Girls and Mojo Jojo t-shirts and other merchandise available only at The Souled Store.

Looney Tunes Merchandise

The Souled Store is proud to present Official Looney Tunes Merchandise in partnership with Warner Bros. It's time to relive your childhood with some extremely nostalgic but hilarious cartoon products, including t-shirts, phone covers, badges, backpacks, notebooks, tote bags, posters, and more!

Peanuts Pajamas:

Pajamas, also known as PJs, jammies, or Jim-jams, are a group of related garments that originated in South Asia. Pajamas, as used in the Western world, are warm and generally loose items of clothing derived from Indian and Persian foundation wear. They're meant to be worn while sleeping and relaxing. Peanut Pajamas are just funky and fun to show off.

Peanut Hoodies:

A hoodie (sometimes spelled hoody and referred to as a hooded pullover) is a pullover with a hood. A muff sewed into the lower front of hoodies is common, as is a drawstring to adjust the hood opening. Peanut hoodies are best to show how you live loud.

Peanut Umbrellas:

Umbrellas are necessary for protection from sunlight and rain. It boasts a 58-inch canopy, a solid frame that can endure heavy winds, and a straight handle with a comfortable grip.

Peanut Boxershorts:

Free boxers or just boxers are other names for boxer shorts. It is a type of underwear that is commonly worn by males. Since 1944, the term has been used in English to refer to all-around-versatile shorts, which are called after the shorts worn by boxers, who require unrestricted leg development (footwork). Boxers come in a variety of styles and designs, but they always have the same loose fit. Best to show off your love for snoopy doodles.

Peanut Joggers:

Joggers were designed to be used for working out, however, like so many other things from the athleisure trend, the standard has evolved and they can now be worn for a variety of occasions. Joggers, as expected, are traditional sports pants that are lightweight, comfy, and have a sporty appeal. Joggers are widest at the top and narrow as they go down the leg, snugly fitting the ankle. The ankles are held close to the body utilizing flexibility too, and most joggers include either a drawstring or an adaptable waist. Joggers best to show your love for snoopy.

Peanut Henley T-shirt:

A Henley shirt is a collarless sweatshirt with a round neck and a placket that is typically 3–5 inches (8–13 cm) long and has 2–5 catches. It's essentially a polo shirt with no collar. The sleeves can be short or long, and they can be produced in any material, though cotton, cotton-polyester blends, and thermals are by far the most popular. Henley shirts are typically associated with men’s wear, however, women's versions have appeared in business casual and casual settings. Show your love for the snoopy club.

Peanut T-shirt:

Our t-shirts will help you say it best when you want to say anything. Well-pressed shirts and tailored trousers will make you seem distinguished, but when you want to say it, our t-shirts will help you say it best. Going out for a quick errand or hanging out with your friends? Our printed t-shirts accessible online makes it simple to make a statement. They're the result of our passion for all things pop culture, so you'll never have to compromise on your preferences. T-shirt designs based on your favorite media and pop culture icons are available to purchase. Choose from striped t-shirts and camouflaged prints, as well as the classic white t-shirt for men and multi-colored patterns, in a variety of best-fitting sizes and colors.

FAQs

  1. Why can't I locate the t-shirt, or any other item, in the style, color, or size that I want?

The colors and sizes available in the online shop, as well as any specific items, are subject to availability. High-demand T-shirts, hoodies, vests, and joggers may be restocked soon. Please contact us if you have any questions about when a specific product will be available online.

  1. What is the product’s durability if purchased from this site?

If you aren't growing weary of our prints, they aren't getting tired of you. They can be washed as many times as you wish and will always look fresh new.

  1. What sizes do you have for men's and women's clothing?

The four sizes available are S, M, L, and XL. See our thorough size chart, which is available on our website and app, to find the right fit for you.

products.user_description:
Harry Potter and it is magic

More than two decades have passed since the first Harry Potter book was published, and more than a decade has passed since Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows concluded the film series.

We've put together a stunning range of items to commemorate the wonderful universe and bring back memories of your childhood. Ours was the generation that awaited our Hogwarts acceptance letter with bated breath. We grew up with Harry, Ron, and Hermione in the magical Potterverse, and it always felt like we were growing up with them.

We loved their first flying lesson, first charms class, Dumbledore's wisdom, disliked Snape but later fell in love with him, and faced Voldemort in the Hogwarts Battle. If you're as obsessed as we think you are about Harry Potter, you'll want to check out our latest Harry Potter products.

The Souled Store: the quidditch winner

The Souled Store arose from the simple concept of loving what you do and following your heart, as well as our fondness for puns (sold/ souled). The motto is simple: life is short; don't waste it on things you don't enjoy. This idea pervades everything we do, from our products to our website, from our workplace atmosphere to how we connect with our consumers. So, it is the ultimate place to find your favorite Harry Potter merchandise as it is the quidditch winner in the heavily competitive market.

Harry Potter and Collection of Merchandise

The Souled Store ensures that Harry Potter's legacy is not forgotten anytime soon. Fans may always keep the enchantment alive by purchasing the latest Harry Potter products available in our store. We also have pajamas, sweatshirts, boxer pants, polo dresses, and much more. Simply visit the website and allow the enchantment to lead your heart.

T-Shirt: Perfect Chosen One

The boy who vanquished the Dark Lord became known as the "boy who lived" because he was the "chosen one." We may not have the opportunity to dress up as Harry Potter, but we can tell you that we have something that will make you look like the chosen one. T-shirts are frequently composed of an elastic, light, and inexpensive fabric that is also easy to clean. Shop The Souled Store for your Harry Potter tees and show off your house pride. What matters most is what's beneath the surface.

Laptop Bag: Hogwarts Journey Pack

You always have a laptop bag with you, irrespective of how far or where you're traveling. You can put as much stuff in them as you like. If you're starting a new semester at Hogwarts, you'll need a laptop bag that can hold your magic wand, textbooks, and laptop. We have the most recent version of Harry Potter laptop bags, which are very adaptable and ideal for both everyday and travel use.

T-shirt Dresses: Yule Ball Dress

Do you have a Yule Ball at your school and are unsure what to wear? Don't be concerned! We have the perfect selection of t-shirt dresses that are both comfy and fashionable. Prepare to be showered with compliments if you pair your dress with some lovely accessories. Harry Potter merchandise in the form of T-shirt dresses is the best thing one can have in the wardrobe.

Pajamas: Ultimate Comfort

Pajamas are the ultimate comfort and feel free nature when one wears them. Pairing these beautiful harry potter pajamas with extra comfortable t-shirts is the best thing possible. Set yourself free in these with night overalls.

Knitted Sweaters: Muggle your shiver away

When one sees Ron’s mother knitting the sweater for all her sons. The other person even starts craving for a hand-knitted sweater. During the winters and festivities wearing the Knitted Sweater of Harry Potter Theme is simply the best way to showcase your love for it. Muggle your cold away with the perfect sweater.

Joggers: Perfect for your run in Dragon Alley

One of the most popular bottom-wear options on the market is joggers. They're well-known for their practicality and elegance. Joggers are frequently seen as part of a workout outfit. Joggers can be worn for a variety of activities, including sports, exercising, and working out at the gym. The joggers with the popular Harry Potter pattern just seem great and make you want to flaunt them when jogging or running in the park. In today's generation, it helps anyone appear more fun-loving and cooler. Joggers have a slim fit, are comfortable, and give greater movement for all your sportswear demands. Joggers come in a variety of colors, sizes, patterns, and styles. Made entirely of cotton and featuring the most beautiful designs.

FAQs

  1. Are you the official Harry Potter merchandise, and do you also sell other items?

Yes, The Souled Store is one of the authorized retailers of Harry Potter items. They have over 100 partner brands that offer their products through us.

  1. What does "official merchandise" mean exactly?

When you buy licensed merchandise, you're assisting creators and the people they entrust with bringing their thoughts to life. They put a lot of time, effort, and money into creating the products they want you to love, as well as ensuring that they meet their high specifications.

  1. Why should you shop at The Souled Store for Harry Potter merchandise?

You may get your favorite Harry Potter t-shirts, polo dresses, and other Harry Potter goods from this website. The souled store has the appropriate goods to aid you with your nostalgia. The Harry Potter books have captivated a generation and have become an integral part of their lives. With the right Harry Potter Merchandise, every one of us can find our own unique story.

The colors and sizes offered in the online shop, as well as any specific goods, are depending on our current supply. T-shirts, hoodies, vests, and joggers that are in high demand may be refilled soon. If you'd like to learn more about when a specific product will be available online, please contact us.

Garfield: Lazy Cat

Garfield, everyone's favorite lazy, lasagna-loving cat, first appeared 40 years ago, but he's still as famous today. The comic strip inspired a television show, as well as computer games, feature films, novels, and, of course, holiday specials—not to mention one particularly memorable car window craze. Garfield merchandise, on the other hand, brings in $750 million to $1 billion every year, which is more in line with Davis' goals. Davis has complete Garfield’s final products but he no longer makes the comic strip in the newspaper.

A stuffed version of the orange cat with suction cups on its legs stuck in a car window is one of the most renowned pieces of Garfield products. In the mid-1980s, this was a huge craze. They were so popular that thousands of car break-ins were reported in big cities, with the suction cup Garfield being the only thing taken.

The Powerpuff Girls

Looney Tunes Merchandise

Peanuts Pajamas:

Pajamas, also known as PJs, jammies, or Jim-jams, are a group of related garments that originated in South Asia. Pajamas, as used in the Western world, are warm and generally loose items of clothing derived from Indian and Persian foundation wear. They're meant to be worn while sleeping and relaxing. Peanut Pajamas are just funky and fun to show off.

Peanut Hoodies:

A hoodie (sometimes spelled hoody and referred to as a hooded pullover) is a pullover with a hood. A muff sewed into the lower front of hoodies is common, as is a drawstring to adjust the hood opening. Peanut hoodies are best to show how you live loud.

Peanut Umbrellas:

Umbrellas are necessary for protection from sunlight and rain. It boasts a 58-inch canopy, a solid frame that can endure heavy winds, and a straight handle with a comfortable grip.

Peanut Boxershorts:

Free boxers or just boxers are other names for boxer shorts. It is a type of underwear that is commonly worn by males. Since 1944, the term has been used in English to refer to all-around-versatile shorts, which are called after the shorts worn by boxers, who require unrestricted leg development (footwork). Boxers come in a variety of styles and designs, but they always have the same loose fit. Best to show off your love for snoopy doodles.

Peanut Joggers:

Joggers were designed to be used for working out, however, like so many other things from the athleisure trend, the standard has evolved and they can now be worn for a variety of occasions. Joggers, as expected, are traditional sports pants that are lightweight, comfy, and have a sporty appeal. Joggers are widest at the top and narrow as they go down the leg, snugly fitting the ankle. The ankles are held close to the body utilizing flexibility too, and most joggers include either a drawstring or an adaptable waist. Joggers best to show your love for snoopy.

Peanut Henley T-shirt:

A Henley shirt is a collarless sweatshirt with a round neck and a placket that is typically 3–5 inches (8–13 cm) long and has 2–5 catches. It's essentially a polo shirt with no collar. The sleeves can be short or long, and they can be produced in any material, though cotton, cotton-polyester blends, and thermals are by far the most popular. Henley shirts are typically associated with men’s wear, however, women's versions have appeared in business casual and casual settings. Show your love for the snoopy club.

FAQs

The colors and sizes available in the online shop, as well as any specific items, are subject to availability. High-demand T-shirts, hoodies, vests, and joggers may be restocked soon. Please contact us if you have any questions about when a specific product will be available online.

  1. What is the product’s durability if purchased from this site?

If you aren't growing weary of our prints, they aren't getting tired of you. They can be washed as many times as you wish and will always look fresh new.

The four sizes available are S, M, L, and XL. See our thorough size chart, which is available on our website and app, to find the right fit for you.

products.user_description:
Buy Marvel Merchandise Online

You’d be lying if you say you’ve never come across the phenomenon called Marvel Entertainment. Maybe you’ve read the comics, enjoyed their animated series, binge-watched their shows or attended the first-day first show of their movies - but you’ve definitely been a part of and grown to love this universe. With our collection of official Marvel merchandise, your favourite superhero universe will never be far away from you.

 

The Legacy of Marvel Universe

In 1939, Marvel Comics’ precursor ‘Timely Comics’ was founded by Martin Goodman. Timely’s first comic book was ‘Marvel Comics no. 1’ and featured the Human Torch and the Sub-Mariner. During the ‘Golden Age of Comics’ in the 1940s, Timely Comics introduced many notable characters like Captain America.  As the 1940s came to close, superhero comics fell out of fashion. In 1951, Timely Comics became Atlas Magazines and its output was in genres like humour, horror and science fiction.

During the late 1950s, the ‘Silver Age of Comics’ was ushered by Marvel’s rival, DC Comics. In the 1960s, Atlas renamed itself as Marvel and revolutionised superhero comics. Stan Lee and Jack Kirby are often credited for introducing superheroes that appealed to older readers and heralding the ‘Marvel Age of Comics’.

The strength of Marvel Universe lies in the fact that the characters introduced, though are superheroes, are rooted in real-world and seem relatable. Their superheroes are often flawed, freaks and misfits - a break from the then-prevalent athletic, handsome and perfect superheroes. Spider-Man was a highschool student, Steve Rogers was bullied, Hulk looked like a monster - characteristics like these struck a chord with older readers and soon Marvel Comics found itself a loyal and ever-growing fanbase in not only kids but also young adults and adults.

 

 

The Best Of Marvel Universe Clothing At The Souled Store

If you are a fan of superheroes and are shopping for official Marvel merchandise online in India, you’ve come to the right place. After all, all your superheroes shop from our store as well. Wondering which Marvel-lous heroes will you find in our collection? Keep reading to find out:

 

Iron Man

Tony Stark aka Iron Man was never just a man in a suit - he was our genius, billionaire, playboy, philanthropist. In the Marvel Cinematic Universe’s Infinity Saga, when he sacrificed himself to defeat Thanos and his army, we all mourned for him. After all, We love him 3000, don’t we? And what better way to show it than buy Iron Man products like the Marvel hoodie, t-shirt, mugs, backpacks and other merch online in India at our store.

 

Captain America

The First Avenger, Steve Rogers aka Captain America is brave, dependable, dedicated and a fit leader. When he decided to retire from the superhero life, he requested our help to fill his wardrobe with merch worthy of the Cap and we obliged. With Marvel hoodies, t-shirts, joggers and boxers that one can wear all day, no wonder our Captain America merch is everyone’s favourite.

Thor

Thor Odinson, the God of Thunder needs no introduction. A central figure in the MCU, Thor has had an incredible journey and re-emerged from the ashes, like a phoenix. Being deemed worthy of wielding the Mjolnir and Stormbreaker, he is a force to be reckoned with. If you are looking to buy Marvel t-shirts for men and women with Thor designs, you’ll find them in our collection.

Hulk

A renowned physicist, Dr Bruce Banner transforms into Hulk when he is angry or stressed. His secret? He’s always angry and hell hath no fury like the Hulk angry. So, don’t be a puny human and shop online for Hulk merch like Marvel hoodies, t-shirts and more from our store.

Black Panther

Being crowned the King of Wakanda, T’Challa is no ordinary monarch. Having gained enhanced strength by ingesting a heart-shaped herb, he not only has physical prowess but has also proven to be an expert strategist and leader. Join the Wakandan royalty with official Black Panther merchandise available online only at our store.

 

Spider-Man

Who doesn’t adore the friendly, neighbourhood Spider-Man. When not busy swinging the streets of New York and fighting alongside the Avengers, he can be found attending highschool classes or studying. If you like the webbed superhero, get official Marvel t-shirts for women and men with Spider-Man merchandise like joggers, backpacks, mugs and more online in India only at our store.

 

Deadpool

The Merc with a Mouth needs no introduction. Perhaps the most famous and loved antihero, he has superhuman levels of stamina, strength, agility, reflexes and accelerated healing. Pair it with his talkative nature, you have the perfect recipe for a character who has no ****s to give. And perhaps the only thing he loves more than chimichangas are the Deadpool t-shirts.

 

Punisher

A vigilante with a uniquely brutal brand of justice, Frank Castle aka Punisher has no qualms punishing the guilty. If you wish to join his cause, shop for official Punisher merchandise like Marvel sweatshirts that are available at our store.

 

X-Men

One of the most famous and recognizable franchises of Marvel, X-Men is a faction of mutants who believe in peace and equality between mutants and humans. Opposing them is the Brotherhood of Mutants, who believe in dominance over humans. No matter which side you choose, you’ll find some cool X-Men merch like Marvel hoodies and more on our website and mobile application.

 

Captain Marvel

One of Marvel’s mightiest superhero and protector of the skies, you can hate her or love her, but you can’t ignore her. Carol Danvers is here to kick some ass and inspire you to go higher, further and faster. Get Captain Marvel t-shirts dresses, mobile covers, mugs and more at our store.

And this is just the icing on the cake. Browse through our collection to shop for merchandise of many other characters like Guardians of the Galaxy, Wolverine, Black Widow, Dark Phoenix, Mysterio and Thanos.

 

Check out the following Marvel merchandise

Marvel T-shirts:

These Marvel t-shirts for men and women are the perfect choice when you’re going out with friends or need something casual for office.

Marvel Hoodies:

These hoodies are for those who want to flaunt their madness for everything Marvel. Be it winter or you are freezing in the office AC, Marvel hoodies are always there to rescue you!

Marvel Jacket:

Show off your love for the Marvel Universe with these trendy and offbeat jackets. Wear it when you are out with your friends so they can too ‘Marvel’ at your Marvel Jackets.

Marvel Sweatshirt:

Your perfect companion on a winter day! These Marvel sweatshirts keep you warm and also lets you cosy up in them.

 

Shop for Official Marvel Merchandise Online in India At The Souled Store

The next time you want to shop for Iron Man t-shirts online or want a cool Captain America backpack – our store is where you should come. Our collection of official Marvel merchandise boasts of men’s t-shirts, women’s t-shirts, joggers, boxers, crop tops, drop cut tees, shirts, tank tops, vests, dresses, backpacks, notebooks, coffee mugs and lapel pins. Just visit our website or download our mobile application and get ready to suit up like your favourite superheroes.

 

FAQs

Do you have official merchandise of Marvel?

YES! All our Marvel products are officially licensed merchandise.

 

Do you only have superhero products?

Hell no! As your one-stop-shop for everything pop-culture, we have official Marvel merchandise of not only all your favourite superheroes but also that of your favourite films, television shows, cartoons like tom and Jerry merchandise, F.R.I.E.N.D.S T-Shirts and its merchandise. We also have a range of exclusive original designs called The Souled Store Originals, which you must definitely checkout.

Your perfect companion on a winter day! These Marvel sweatshirts keep you warm and also lets you cosy up in them.
